message.desc: Validates Task for approved
message.text: Task is not in approved status!

message.text: Task has no region configured!

message.text: Task has no message configured!

message.desc: Validates task for message
message.text: Task message is not approved!

message.desc: Validates task for task status
message.text: Task has been completed. To process task again, please copy this to a new Task.

message.desc: Validates task has enough receiver counts
message.text: Task must have at least one desired receivers!

message.desc: A task must have receivers
message.text: Task regions and groups configured have no receivers

message.desc: Task must have either region or groups configured.
message.text: Task has no region and no groups configured!

message.desc: User must have privileges to approve task
message.text: You do not have privileges to approve or unapprove tasks

message.desc: User must have privileges to process task
message.text: You do not have privileges to process tasks

message.desc: No task receivers found while processing
message.text: No task receivers found while processing

message.desc: Task has been submitted and is pending processing
message.text: Task has been submitted and is pending processing

message.desc: Error message conversion of consituency converter
message.text: Exception at conversion! Please contact hunter support!

message.desc: Task Message Must be approved
message.text: Task Message is not in approved status!

message.desc: Task Message Must have Text!
message.text: Task Message has no Text!

message.desc: Message is already processed!
message.text: Task message is already processed!

message.desc: Template name provided does not exist. Please used the template names in hunter constants.
message.text: Template name provided does not exist!

message.desc: Email type provided does not exist. Please use Hunter established email types!
message.text: Email type provided does not exist!

message.desc: For instance, if task is email but message is Text Message
message.text: Invalid message type configured!

message.desc: Message must be in approved status.
message.text: Task message must be in approved status

message.text: Task Message does not have service provider!
